thread.title: Noranda Income Fund Announces Webcast of Annual General Meeting and Fiscal 2018 First Quarter Financial Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Noranda Income Fund Announces Webcast of Annual General Meeting and Fiscal 2018 First Quarter Financial Results
text:
TORONTO, April 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Noranda Income Fund (TSX:NIF.UN) (the “Fund”) announces that it will host a webcast, including a slide presentation, during its Annual General Meeting (“AGM”) on Friday, April 27, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time. Eva Carissimi, President and CEO, and Michael Boone, CFO, of the Fund’s manager, will review the financial results for the first quarter of fiscal 2018 at the AGM. The Fund expects to report its financial results for the quarter prior to market open on the same day, April 27, 2018.
To access the webcast and view the slide presentation from the Noranda Income Fund website, please visit http://www.norandaincomefund.com/investor/presentations.php or click the link below:
http://webcast.servicewebdiffusion.com/noranda-eng . (English)
http://webcast.servicewebdiffusion.com/noranda-fr (French)
Please connect at least 15 minutes prior to the start of the meeting to ensure adequate time for any software download that may be required to join the webcast. The webcast will be archived on the company's website following the meeting date.
To access the webcast by telephone, dial 1-866-830-9441, access code 9192413 (English) or 1-866-518-5884, access code 3722750 (French). Please connect approximately 10 minutes prior to the beginning of the call to ensure participation.
Please note, due to timing and logistics of the Annual General Meeting and tour of the Processing Facility, questions from analysts will not be taken following the presentation from management (which will directly follow the formal portion of the Annual General Meeting). Please contact Mr. Michael Boone, Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Canadian Electrolytic Zinc Limited, Noranda Income Fund’s Manager, to answer any questions regarding the first quarter 2018. Mr. Boone’s contact details are provided at the bottom of this release.
Noranda Income Fund is an income trust whose units trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol “NIF.UN”. Noranda Income Fund owns the electrolytic zinc processing facility and ancillary assets (the “Processing Facility”) located in Salaberry de-Valleyfield, Québec. The Processing Facility is the second-largest zinc processing facility in North America and the largest zinc processing facility in eastern North America, where the majority of zinc customers are located. It produces refined zinc metal and various by-products from sourced zinc concentrates. The Processing Facility is operated and managed by Canadian Electrolytic Zinc Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Glencore Canada Corporation.
Further information about Noranda Income Fund can be found at:
www.norandaincomefund.com .
For further information, please contact:
Michael Boone, Vice President & Chief Financial Officer of Canadian Electrolytic Zinc Limited, Noranda Income Fund’s Manager
Tel: 416-775-1561
info@norandaincomefund.com
Source: Fonds de revenu Noranda
